Commentary: Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, Irfan starts off with a short ball angling away outside off, rears up at the batsman, Shafiq jumps off his ground and fends this chest-high delivery to the right of the cordon
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, french-cut away for four. Good length and seams back in, takes the inside edge and streaks away fine on the leg side past the leg stump
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, Iran runs in hard and sends down a short ball outside off, jabbed into the covers
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, not as short as the previous ball outside off, drags a pull to the right of mid-on
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 2 runs, short and outside off, Shehzad rises with the ball and works it away through square leg for a double
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, full and attacking the front pad of the batsman, nudged away square on the leg side again, this time just a single

Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, SIX, and Shehzad welcomes him with a pulled six. Just short of a good length and outside off, Shehzad picks it up and dumps the ball over midwicket. Clears the short boundary. This strike suggests it's a belter
Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, back of a length, picked off through midwicket
Mohammad Sami to Asad Shafiq, no run, back of a length and outside off, kicks at Shafiq, he can't get on top of the ball. A jabbing punch to cover ensues
Mohammad Sami to Asad Shafiq, no run, back of a length and outside off, punched firmly, but can't beat Dwayne Smith diving across to his right from backward point
Mohammad Sami to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, short of a length and angled into the right-hander, bunted to mid-on

Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, back of a length and outside off, Shehzad has a skittish waft at the ball and inside-edges it beside his feet. An over of short of a length or back of a length ball ends
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, no run, short of a length and angling away outside off, the short ball seems to be the trend today. Shafiq nearly swings himself off his feet. Beaten lavishly
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, no run, beaten lavishly again. Short and angling away outside off, this time Shafiq eyes up a cut, not a pull, and does not make contact
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, dug in short and thuds into the splice of the bat as Shafiq leaps off his feet and awkwardly fends it to the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, length ball angling away outside off, Shehzad hits through the line and punchily drives it between point and cover
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, fuller than the previous ball, dabbed with soft hands to point now
Mohammad Irfan to Ahmed Shehzad, FOUR, full and outside off, Shehzad leans into the drive and stylishly strokes the ball through extra cover. Away she whistles to the boundary
Rumman Raees to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, very full and angling away outside off, drives, but not off the middle, to mid-off. Shafiq finds some breathing space at the other end
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, no run, good length and angling away outside off, played back down the pitch
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, pitched up and outside off, Shehzad does not need any second invitations to drive. Leans forward and hits the ball to mid-off

Rumman Raees to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, Shafiq shows his ace early. Runs down the track, the left-arm seamer is wary of it, dragging his length back. Shafiq swishes the ball to mid-off. That looked ungainly too
Rumman Raees to Ahmed Shehzad, 1 run, picked off the hips to long leg. Shehzad flowing at the other end
Rumman Raees to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, beats mid-off diving across to his right. Will that get Shafiq going? Length ball outside off, he drills it down the ground for his first boundary

Mohammad Sami to Ahmed Shehzad, OUT, Sami, who was greeted by Shehzad with a mighty six, has a bit of revenge. He lets out an animated roar. Shehzad can't believe it. Dug in short on off, this is more a short-arm flap than a short-arm pull. Drags a catch to mid-on
Wicket: ['Ahmed Shehzad c Zohaib Khan b Mohammad Sami 26 (15b 3x4 1x6) SR: 173.33']

Commentary: Mohammad Sami to Pietersen, OUT, pinned 'em in front. Two wickets in two balls for Sami. An inswinging yorker first up, pings the front boot in line with off stump, too quick for KP. It would have carried onto hit the leg stump. The umpire raises his finger and sends KP on his way. Second successive duck for KP
Mohammad Sami to Rossouw, 1 run, full and outside off, sliced away from the body past point
Wicket: ['KP Pietersen lbw b Mohammad Sami 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00']

Commentary: Mohammad Sami to Asad Shafiq, no run, full and outside off, driven back down the pitch
Mohammad Sami to Asad Shafiq, no run, very full and tails in, near yorker, dug out
Mohammad Sami to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, clipped away to deep square for one
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, back of a length on off, Shafiq clears his front leg and hoicks it across the line over midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, no run, bouncer outside off, uses his height to pose a threat to Shafiq. He ignores it, ducking out of the way
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, 2 runs, back of a length and angled in on off, hangs back and flicks it away square through the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, no run, full-toss outside off, instead of bashing that out of the ground, Shafiq mis-times it to cover
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, short of a good length and outside off, Shafiq sits back and pulls to the right of midwicket. Watson throws himself to his right and makes a good save
Mohammad Irfan to Rossouw, no run, back of a length and on a fifth-stump line, Rossouw stands tall and punches into the covers
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, legbreak outside off, driven to sweeper cover
Shadab Khan to Rossouw, 1 run, short and spins, clipped away on the back foot towards deep square leg
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, full and sliding into the leg stump, goes low and sweeps a single to long leg
Shadab Khan to Rossouw, no run, quick fizzer from Shadab, defended to the off side
Shadab Khan to Rossouw, 1 run, tossed up on the leg stump, inside-edged fine on the leg side
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, stretches outside off for the sweep. Drags the ball with a hard sweep to deep square leg
Watson to Asad Shafiq, 2 runs, full and outside off, uses his feet and drills a drive past mid-off
Watson to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, off-stump yorker, whipped away to deep midwicket
Watson to Rossouw, 1 run, short and outside off, drags a pull through square leg

Watson to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, keeps it short on off, Shafiq has nailed this pull for a change. Swivels on the back foot, assured footwork, and pulls it to the right of the leg umpire. Pinged off the middle of the bat
Watson to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, yorker on off or just a shade outside off, squirted to cover
Watson to Rossouw, no run, yorker outside off, Rossouw swishes and misses outside off
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, tossed-up legbreak outside off, driven on the front foot past mid-off's left
Shadab Khan to Rossouw, 1 run, tossed up on the leg stump, Rossouw hacks at it and the ball rolls to deep square off the inside half
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, drags a sweep from outside off through backward square leg
Shadab Khan to Rossouw, no run, Haddin fluffs a stumping chance. Rossouw uses his feet and runs past a slider. Haddin does not stay low enough and he can't collect the ball cleanly
Shadab Khan to Rossouw, 1 run, dropped short and outside off, square-cut away
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, quick dart on off, chopped away by Shafiq now through point
Watson to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, Shafiq backs away outside leg, meets a short ball, and punches to long-off
Watson to Rossouw, 1 run, back of a length and outside off, carved away to deep point
Watson to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, full-toss on off, which is slapped down to long-off
Watson to Rossouw, no run, wide yorker outside off, Watson makes Rossouw reach out for the ball. The batsman can't touch it. Smart bowling

Watson to Rossouw, OUT, swiped straight down the throat of long-on. Haddin reprieved him on 5. Rossouw adds only two more runs before holing out to Raees. Haddin will be relieved. Short of a length and outside off, miscued to long-on
Watson to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, full on off, punched to long-on

Shadab Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, legbreak outside off, beats the batsman outside off with turn and bounce. Haddin gloves the ball cleanly and swipes the bails off but Sarfraz's back foot went nowhere
Wicket: ['RR Rossouw c Rumman Raees b Watson 7 (13b 0x4 0x6) SR: 53.84']

Commentary: Shadab Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, tossed outside off, brings out the sweep and hits to deep square
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, shorter legbreak outside off, chopped to short third man
Shadab Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, tapped into the covers for one
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, floated outside off, swept to deep square leg
Shadab Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, starts on off and turns away, guided off the bat-face to short third man
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, short and outside off from around the wicket, chopped away to cover
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, shorter and wider outside off, cracked away to sweeper cover on the back foot
Zohaib Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, arrowed through outside off, non-turning ball, flayed to wide long-off
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, SIX, dangled up on off stump, Sarfraz goes low, unleashes his favourite slog-sweep, and sends the white ball into the stands beyond midwicket
Zohaib Khan to Sarfraz Ahmed, 1 run, short and wide outside off, backs away and slashes it for one
Zohaib Khan to Asad Shafiq, FOUR, Shafiq dashes down the track, meets a half-volley and drills it fiercely down the ground, forcing Sarfraz to duck for cover. 13 runs off the over

Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, no run, short of a length on middle, glances the hip and rolls on the pitch. He chances a quick single, Rumman swoops in and attacks the ball, but can't break the stumps. Sarfraz would have been out had Rumman hit

Rumman Raees to Sarfraz Ahmed, OUT, Rumman has his man now. Sarfraz uses his feet, Rumman drags his length back. This gets big on Sarfraz. He attempts a hook. Has to settle with a top edge. Haddin tracks down the skier. Well done, Isalamabad
Rumman Raees to Asad Shafiq, no run, full on off, pushed to cover
Rumman Raees to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, shuffles across off and works a full ball towards square leg
Rumman Raees to Mahmudullah, 1 run, very full on the pads, flicked away calmly to fine leg
Wicket: ['Sarfraz Ahmed c †Haddin b Rumman Raees 12 (11b 0x4 1x6) SR: 109.09']

Commentary: Rumman Raees to Asad Shafiq, no run, Shafiq slinks away outside leg stump, slower ball outside off, flat-batted away to point
Shadab Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run, full and angled in on off, nudged into the vacant spaces at midwicket
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, dropped short and outside off, cut to deep point
Shadab Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run, skids on outside off, Mahmudullah aims a reverse-sweep, loses his balance and falls over. But his back leg was grounded by the time Haddin broke the stumps
Shadab Khan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, slower legbreak, length ball, turns away, the batsman hangs back and knocks it to the leg side
Shadab Khan to Mahmudullah, no run, a bit too full to attempt the sweep. Dragged away square on the leg side

Shadab Khan to Mahmudullah, no run, a ripper to finish a ripping spell. Starts around off and spins away outside off, whistling past the groping bat. He ends with figures of 4-0-19-0. A boundary-less four-over spell!
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, yorker on off, the batsman, having backed away, jams the ball fine of deep third man
Mohammad Irfan to Mahmudullah, 2 runs, back of a length and outside off, throws his bat at the ball. An inside-edge streaks away to long leg

Mohammad Irfan to Mahmudullah, FOUR, The top edge sails over the head of Haddin. Sails over the boundary. Irfan bends his back and sends down a short ball outside off. Mahmudullah stepped out, attempted a hook, and watched the top-edge fly away for a six
Mohammad Irfan to Mahmudullah, 2 runs, full-toss just outside off, carved towards third man
Mohammad Irfan to Mahmudullah, 1 run, jumps off his ground and glides a short ball from outside off to a diving short third man
Mohammad Irfan to Asad Shafiq, 1 run, full-toss on off, stabbed past Irfan's left to mid-off

Watson to Asad Shafiq, OUT, Shafiq falls first ball after the break. He falls for a Jekyll-and-Hyde 45. Shortish and outside off, he looks to swing across the line. Loses his shape and misses. Watson hits the top of off
Watson to Perera, 1 run, back of a length and outside off, cudgeled to deep cover
Watson to Mahmudullah, 1 run, full on off, patted to the leg side on the back foot
Watson to Perera, SIX, full and outside off, right up in Thisara's hitting arc. Opens up his shoulders and launches it straight over the bowler's head
Watson to Perera, no run, wide yorker, Thisara can only carve it away to short third man
Watson to Perera, 1 run, full and outside off, smeared to cover, where the fielder fumbles
Mohammad Sami to Perera, FOUR, yorker outside off, Thisara backs away outside leg, jams his bat down and edges it past Haddin's left
Mohammad Sami to Perera, 1 run, speared full and outside off, slashed to cover
Mohammad Sami to Mahmudullah, 1 run, off-stump yorker on off, jammed down the ground
Mohammad Sami to Perera, no run, wide yoker outside off, swipes and does not make contact
Mohammad Sami to Perera, 1 run, marginally misses the yorker. A really full ball outside off, carved to deep point
Mohammad Sami to Mahmudullah, no run, nails a yorker, dug back to the bowler
Rumman Raees to Perera, 1 run, full-toss outside off, eyes a big leg-side slog, skews the ball up over cover
Rumman Raees to Mahmudullah, no run, slower short ball outside off, shoulder-high delivery, attempts a hook and is beaten by the lack of pace
Rumman Raees to Mahmudullah, 1 run, yorker on leg stump, whipped to deep square leg
Rumman Raees to Perera, 1 run, slower ball, drilled down the ground
Rumman Raees to Mahmudullah, SIX, slower one again, from the back of the hand, Mahmudullah manufactures his own pace. Length ball outside off, smeared over the bowler's head for a six
Rumman Raees to Mahmudullah, 1 run, punched over the bowler's head for one
Mohammad Sami to Mahmudullah, 1 run, very full and outside off, opens the face and slices a drive to backward point
Mohammad Sami to Perera, 2 runs, full and outside off, hammered straight over the bowler's head. The bowler was ducking for cover or rather taking evasive action
Mohammad Sami to Perera, 1 run, full-toss outside off, slapped away to deep cover
Mohammad Sami to Mahmudullah, 1 run, change-up slower ball outside off, driven down to long-off
Mohammad Sami to Perera, 1 run, yorker, swings in, inside-edged onto the pad. The ball dribbles back to Sami
Mohammad Sami to Mahmudullah, FOUR, full-toss outside off, Mahmudullah sizes it up and slams it straight of long-on. Muscled it away with authority
Rumman Raees to Perera, FOUR, low full-toss outside off, carved away over point for four
Rumman Raees to Perera, no run, banged in short and outside off, Thisara lets it pass over him. He questioningly looks at the umpire anticipating a wide for height. It wasn't to be
Rumman Raees to Perera, 2 runs, very full and outside off, kerplunked into the leg side off the inside half
Rumman Raees to Perera, 1 run, slower short ball, swiped off the inside half to square leg
Rumman Raees to Mahmudullah, 1 run, full on the legs, full-blooded flick to fine leg

Rumman Raees to Perera, OUT, low full-toss on off, Thisara can only push it back to Rumman. He stops the ball with his right boot, scoops the ball into his hands, then spins back, aims at the stumps and adroitly under-arms it at the non-striker's end to catch Thisara short
